subject: RE: RE: A shipment from order #SSN4778 is on the way
description_text:
Hi everyone,

Amazing how 1 month and 1 week later...and everythings stills the same.

SF Express SF6047209218788<https://www.sf-express.com/we/ow/chn/en/waybill/waybill-detail/SF6047209218788>, the pedals are not ready, the haptic was sent in 30/12/2025 and still don´t have anything...

What do you understand by "we´ll get back to you SHORTLY"?? 3 months??

Best regards

Francisco Carneiro
________________________________
De: service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>
Enviado: 7 de janeiro de 2026 09:27
Para: frankcisco_rc@msn.com <frankcisco_rc@msn.com>
Assunto: Re: RE: A shipment from order #SSN4778 is on the way

Hi Francisco carneiro,

Due to the peak season, we have experienced an order backlog, which has caused some delays. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. I’ve already asked our operations team to check the tracking number for your pedals, and we’ll get back to you shortly.


On Mon, 5 Jan at 7:08 AM , Francisco carneiro <frankcisco_rc@msn.com> wrote:
Hello again,

just to say that when i search the Track & Trace from my order the answer is: " The following waybills have not been collected or have been shipped for more than 3 months: SF6047209218788".

I know that a ticket is made for this purchase but it still says that the only thing that is prepared for shipping is the Haptic Reactor....

I´m waiting the answer.

Francisco Carneiro
________________________________
De: SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com>
Enviado: 30 de dezembro de 2025 11:48
Para: frankcisco_rc@msn.com <frankcisco_rc@msn.com>

conversations.body_text: Hi Francisco carneiro,  We are very sorry for the inconvenience caused by the out-of-stock products.It is found that your order will be shipped in two packages:  1. Regarding the pedal  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.    2. Regarding the tactile reactor  It is found that it was shipped on the 5th and is currently in transit, and is expected to arrive around the 22nd.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047209218788  We are very sorry for the inconvenience caused to you. If you have any further questions, we will give priority to answering them for you.
